meaningMnemonic: You use a <radical>roof</radical> to keep yourself <radical>dry</radical> and safe from <kanji>outer space</kanji>. Look outside, above your roof, and you'll see outer space stretching above you.
readingMnemonic: Why isn't it dry in <kanji>outer space</kanji>, you ask? Because of all the <reading>u</reading>ni (う) swimming around up there. They have nasty, wet, pointy spikes and they're all over the place.
